title: The Outer Shell Spring Sale is On!
content:
Outer Shell is stocked up for a big sale on its sewn-in San Francisco bags! The brand usually has a sale around this time every year to kick off the season.

As a thank you to all the Outer Shell fans and customers out there, Kyle and Jim are offering the following discounts on orders:

  • Free shipping $100+
  • 15% off $150+
  • 20% off $250+

Now’s a time to pick up one of our favorite on-the-bike “camera” bags, or a tote bag, camera strap, and more. Head on over to Outer Shell to scope the offerings.

If you’d like to see inside Outer Shell’s space, check out John’s recent Shop Visit…
